Articles.Content:
70. Build an Inter-Continental Ballistic Missile

71. Build a bomber with B9

72. Strap the ICBM to the bomber (or vice versa)
73. Bump this (optional)
74.do everything on 'how to get kicked out of walmart" thread

*Redacted due to being repetitive* 75. Successfully burn up a Kerbal in the sun. (IE lower solar periapsis to below 0)

75. Successfully burn up 7 Kerbals in the sun in one flight (Like wayyy more difficult)

Edited February 4, 2014 by BadEnoughDudez

76. get two pieces of bread, land on gilly, put a piece of bread on one side, fly over, put the other piece of bread exactly opposite the first one. Gilly sandwich.

77. Attempt to eat the gilly sandwich.
78. Try to make a space shuttle and land on Minmus, only to witness rapid unplanned deconstruction of your base that you spent 100+ hours on.
Add MOAR BOOSTERS

79. Less boosters, more smart.

80. Smack everyone who says more boosters and explain why!

81. Smack everyone that says more boosters is an unintelligent move and say that you want a quick and dumb solution.

82. "Land" and "Take Off" from Minmus's ice lakes with an SSTO.

XX. Opinions! Not on the internet!

83. Make a party 200km above Kerbol!

84. Stick to the topic of a thread.

85. Make an rocket so big it collapses into a black hole and swallows the entire solar system.

86. Make a rocket so complex to fly you drive Jeb to drink (very hard since Kerbals don't seem to drink).
14:Sabotage a rocket launch using a rover
87: Sabotage a rocket launch using a boat.

88: Sabotage a rocket launch using a kinetic bombardment satellite.

Edited July 23, 2014 by Bioman222
removed a "a rocket launch"
89: Sabotage a rocket launch by leaving the handbrake on.
90. leave the rover's parking brake off on a hillside.
91.Build A sports Car and drive it on every moon
92. Build the smallest, simplest and functional probe you can think of, strap a seat on top, add some wheels and send that thing to every planet!
93. Rage at the game for making it hard to build a cargo plane.
94. Give Your-self A Seizure With 100,000x Timewarp

95: necro this thread.

96: 1-launch grand tour.

97. Repurpose a light probe launcher to launch its payload to Ike and get cheap (cost: ~20,000) science

98. Install tons of mods

99. Play KSP instead of doing homework

100. Have 100 fun things to do

101. Strap rockets to a rover

102. Reach a forum game's goal

103. Continue the game. #duckthapolice

104. Skydive

105. Use an asteroid as a core for your station

106. Kerbal space trains. Think of the possibilities.
107. Use kerbals fart as propulsion.

108. Alt-F12 everywhere.

Anywhere.

All the time.
